snippet: The president of the United Nations Security Council in 1994 apologized on Wednesday for their failure to do anything to halt the slaughter of more than one million people during the Rwandan genocide.
abstract: Colin Keating, diplomat who was president of the United Nations Security Council in April 1994, apologizes for Council’s failure to do anything to halt the slaughter of more than one million people during the Rwandan genocide.
lead_paragraph: The president of the United Nations Security Council in 1994 apologized on Wednesday for their failure to do anything to halt the slaughter of more than one million people during the Rwandan genocide.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
